name: Nate Hubbard
text: The food here is amazing and the owner is very kind. The shawarma is excellent, and the lentil soup is addictive. The prices are very reasonable for the quality. We will be back for more.

name: Cricket Wireless
text: The good is fantastic. I highly recommend chicken shawerma. Its good tasty good that you won't find anywhere else.

name: Justin Malone
text: The food is amazing!  Perfectly seasoned and prepared meat, authentic tabouli, and the best hummus that my wife has ever had.

name: Carli S
text: Great service! Kefta, hummus and shawarma were awesome! Long wait time but food was fresh! Definitely will be back.

name: H M
text: Food was great at regular restaurant prices, but the quality of the food was great. I do recommend this place to everyone love food.

name: Gregory Johnson
text: I order here frequently and most of the time I have had a bad experience. On one order of  flavored wings that I get all the time they overcharged me saying that the order is now two flavors. On other order they forgot my ranch. The food is alright, but the customer service is quite bad.

name: Rajeev Kumar
text: Had the chicken Shawarma sandwich and was delighted..good to see a place like this in Huntsville...will go back for more.

name: mohamed obaid
text: great staff, awesome food that I never found in Huntsville highly recommended!!!!my number one choice so far.

name: Sam Woodson
text: I tried the Lamb & Beef Shawarma sandwich to go. The meat was VERY Tender!

name: LaFredrick Colbert
text: Chicken to a whole new beat, love it....

name: Tyler Barber
text: Nice service, terrible food. I got the chicken shawarma and hummus and I couldn't even finish either. It was overpriced as well. Like Big Sean said, "I ain't never going back"

name: Tony Mike
text: "One of the best restaurants hands down"

name: Chevis Darby
text: The food is fantastic.

name: Nikka Benson
text: Great food Great owners!

name: Abdel Abunameh
text: Expensive,  good food.

name: Debbie Duquette
text: Great food

name: Mohammed R
text:
(Translated by Google) It's amazing restaurant don't miss it

(Original)
مطعم ممتاز جداً It's amazing restaurant don't miss it

name: Hana Haddad
text:
(Translated by Google) Excellent restaurant
5 Star

(Original)
مطعم ممتاز
5 ستار

name: Michelle Poague
text: I loved it when they first opened.  Tonight I ordered the gyro plate. The girl said "you want the what?" I had to show her on the menu.  It's supposed to come with pita bread, hummus dip, fresh fruit, wild rice, Greek salad, and gyro meat. This used to be my favorite thing to get. Tonight I got white rice that took 25 minutes to cook. No pita bread, no hummus dip, no fruit, no dressing on the salad. Clearly they aren't familiar with their own menu. For my daughter I ordered fish and onion rings. She couldn't have tilapia because they were out. When I got home there were fries not onion rings in the container. It was fantastic when it first opened. There is a serious lack of consistency at this point. I doubt I'll visit there again.

name: Individual 1
text:
They have the best wings in T-town.

It doesn't look like much but the food is delicious.

10/10 would eat again

name: m. Rainer
text: Best restaurant in the area!!!  The service here blows every other restaurant in town away.  Food is outstanding and changes with the local produce.  If you want a great meal and you're willing to pay just a little extra for the service this is the place to be.

name: Jimi Threet
text: I've been to Maestro 2300 a twice now. This place is amazing to say the least. The passion in the food is second to none. The ingredients in the food are fresh, complimentary to one another, and always well prepared. The presentation is like art on a plate. The atmosphere in the restaurant is classy yet warm and inviting. The staff are phenomenal, always eager to serve. A great place to take a date or even the family.

name: Jeffrey Chieppa
text: Had drinks and appetizers with the range and reef. Great music, great service, great food. Drinks were good.

name: Ben Boyd
text: Great food, impressive wine menu, excellent service. Perfect for special occasions or when you just want a fine dining experience.

name: Kevin Ellis
text: excellent food and service,  nice atmosphere, clean and relaxing.  Great place to have dinner

name: auburn phan
text:
Would NEVER recommend this place to anyone in Auburn. Me and my boyfriend got food poisoning from eating here. If you are going to spend that much don't spend that much to throw up and stay in the bathroom. Very disappointed.

Food poisoning occurs when you swallow food that contains bacteria, parasites, viruses, or toxins made by these germs.

- Now that is just gross. Clean it up Maestro 2300.

name: Mohammadnaser Ansari
text: You should try the filet burger. Definitely a top 5 burger in Auburn

name: Linda V. Russo
text: Wonderful menu and wine list, and outstanding service !

name: Holly Lollar
text: Delicious authentic Greek street food. I lived in Greece for a summer and these mouthwatering menu items bring back all the memories! Colorful healthy salads- favorite is the Beet Salad. Nutritious options for “on-the-go” families. LOVE the “app-drive-thru” for fast pickup. Definitely try the lamb- the seasoning is amazing!

name: Terri Goode Parker
text: The Greek street corn is a must.  I also loved the cucumber salad. Fresh but different. I’m excited about this convenient addition to the neighborhood

name: Penny Thomas
text:
Disappointing.
Literally one table inside. No place to sit. Not a sit down restaurant. Food comes out in a brown bag, no plates, no cups. Drinks are either can sodas or bottled water. Not all at what was expected based on Instagram photos. Food is just ok, not amazing. Not a place to go if you’re wanting to sit and enjoy a meal.

name: Kat Jarboe
text: We LOVE this restaurant! Great concept to be able to get super tasty, authentic Greek food in a “quick” way!  I had the Halal Chicken sandwich the other day and it literally was amazing. The roll/bread it comes on was soft/fresh and added to how much I liked the sandwich. But the flavors of the Halal chicken and toppings was really what made it awesome. The fries were great… they are the crinkle kind with seasoning. Nice and crispy and just enough spice!  I had a taste of the beef and lamb salad bowl and it was VERY good, as well! My daughter had the chicken roll up with fries. She is picky and really liked it too.  Definitely stop by and try various menu items!! It is REALLY tasty!

name: Brian Thomas
text:
Not bad but also not good. Very disappointing overall.
My biggest complaint is that my wife and I went expecting to be able to sit down and have a meal, but there is one tiny table and a small "bar" allowing only about half a dozen to dine at once, and not at all a nice atmosphere because of other people coming in behind you to order and wait for food.
We both got a gyro and while the meat was plentiful and good, there were fries in it which maybe is how it is served in Greece, but we did not care for it. The Greek rice was just fair, the Greek fries were just fries with seasoned salt, and I asked for no onions in my gyro and it came covered in them. There is no soda fountain station so you have to order bottled water or cans of soda. No cups, ice, or straws. Would not be very kid friendly at all. The food came in a brown paper bag which looked nothing like the pictures of food we saw on social media. No plates.
The one thing we agreed was good was the whipped feta appetizer. Very tasty. We expected something along the lines of a Taziki's or Purple Onion as far as it being a sit down restaurant, so we found it very unsatisfying. If you are looking for a takout Greek place give it a try, but in my opinion there are better options.

name: Tokyo Blues Man
text:
This place is awesome in every possible way.
My wife, our older son and I went there last night and we throughly enjoyed everything we had.
Staff is very friendly and courteous, food is awesome and very nice atmosphere.  And the price is very reasonable, too.
I will definitely continue to come to this place and I highly recommend it to anyone who enjoys Greek street food.

name: Carla Stec
text: We've tried quite a few things on the menu and all were perfectly cooked. Options are all super delicious and slightly different than any other restaurant in the area. Love this new restaurant and will be back! Highly recommend!

name: SCJ Sims
text:
My husband brought home take-out from the Greek Cafe. He went through their convenient pick up drive-thru.
The gyros were amazing! The rice was probably the best I've ever had.  Everything tasted so fresh.
We are glad to have this new addition in our area!

name: Lindsay Mardick
text: The food was fresh and wonderful! Excellent customer service. We tried several things (lamb, beef, corn, kids grilled cheese, etc.) and it was all good! We will be back again soon!

name: Hannah Strickland
text: This was delicious and the place had a nice atmosphere. I will definitely be back!

name: Brandon
text: Try a sample of the pork and chicken, I'm at the soft open. It's fresh, juicy, and really taste every bit of flavor. Tried a sample of the cheesecake dessert and yes it's great!

name: Barbara Lawson
text: Our To-Go dinner included the Whipped Feta Dip and Hummus Dip. Neither appetizers came with the pita bread that was included. So we ended up with two dips with nothing to dip in them.

name: Michael Lane
text: This place is amazing if you like Greek food it is a must!!

name: Abby Phillips
text: Delicious Mediterranean food, sweet people, and exceptionally generous for being brand new! Their Falafel and beef Wraps are delicious.

name: Jackancoke
text: This place is a must amazing food!!

name: Biju Nair
text: Grand openings...

name: Randy Silk
text: Might be my new favorite Mediterranean food in Huntsville. All food is made in the Turkish style. Chicken wrap and Hamburger(surprisingly) are additive and amazing. Everything was seasoned perfectly and not overpowering. Taziki and Humus are both made in house, fresh, and taste delicious. Baklava was both sweet and a little savory (do not ask for honey, it's an insult to the chef and it doesn't need any). Baklava pairs nicely with a cup of unsweetened Earl Grey Tea or Black Coffee. I can't believe I waited so long to try this place.

name: kanth P
text:
Good size portion, decently priced.

Must visit for Mediterranean food fans.

name: John Montefusco
text: Best gyro in South Huntsville.  Never had a bad experience :)

name: Samantha Way
text: Delicious food fast and friendly service.

name: Jerome Ross Lacbayan
text: Good food and healthy..... Best food dor me so far :)

name: Christopher C. Thompson
text:
Food is great! They make the falafels by hand onsite when you order.

However, it appears that the restaurant has either closed or moved. The booth where they were located inside the Parkway Place Mall is now empty. I hope they have a new location. Good food.

name: David Phears
text: If you are expecting anything like the common street food Döner Box or Döner Kebabs found everywhere in Europe, you will be sorely disappointed here.  Staff was excellent and friendly though it was VERY busy. It’s not bad food, but it’s something entirely different than the name means to me. I also have to agree with the other review I read on here that there is way too much rice compared to the meat and fries.

name: Jamie Davenport
text: Great fresh food at an affordable price...very friendly staff and the food was served in a timely manner I will be back. I would definitely recommend this restaurant

name: Carl Labrado
text: This is best place in food court at parkway mall! Highly recommended. I never had Gyro wrap like this! Friendly employee. They let me try their authentic Falafel. Everything is fresh and home made taziki. I can’t wait to try whole menu. See you soon DonerBox. :)

name: Nickie Garbeil
text: Fantastic falafel and hummus. I can't wait to come back!

name: Nikki Berkil
text: The food is amazing,  taste just like the food I love when living abroad. Friendly service.

name: Frances Hamilton
text: I am shocked by the great reviews here!! Because of the great reviews, my husband and I visited Cafe Doner Box.  We left extremely disappointed.  We visited yesterday afternoon, June 16, 2018.  A tall gentleman took our order.  While we waited, I had my back turned towards the counter and my husband said, "Did you see what he just did?"  He explained that the gentleman who took our order grabbed half of a cookie off of the cookie tray, turned his back towards us, and shoved it in his mouth.  At first I thought my husband was joking, but soon after the gentleman walked over to the window between the front and the kitchen and handed the cooks the bowl of sliced tomatoes from the front display case.  I saw him wipe his nose on the back of his hand, then upon returning the tomatoes to the case, he put his hand in the bowl, grabbed a sliced tomato and popped it into his mouth!!!  I watched him like a hawk afterwards to make sure he didn't touch anything but my tray between the window and the counter.  My husband was like, "Hey, he is not preparing our food, so I relaxed a little."  I was hoping the food would be good, but it wasn't.  The salad that came with my falafel plate was semi-watery and had no flavor, nor did this taziki sauce (I didn't touch the tomatoes).  The meat on the doner plate was OK, but we were surprised that it did not come with pita bread or anything.  The hummus was OK, but I've had much better.  We definitely will not be returning.  Again, we are both really shocked at the great ratings of this restaurant.

name: Trevor Anderson
text: Great food, good prices, and friendly people.

name: Star Set
text: Absolutely amazing. I cried when all that flavor hit my mouth! Keep up the good work!! Deffo returning!

name: EM AD
text: Spectacularly authentic doner/gyro! I have tasted authentic gyro/doner before. I have tried a majority of the ones in Huntsville, and you will never find a better tasting gyro than what donerbox offers! Just writing about it is making me crave another one :)

name: HSV 702
text: We left Europe nearly four years ago and one of the delicacies we miss the most was the beloved Turkish doner.  Well, our problems have been solved.  We recently heard from a friend that this place had just opened and it was delicious.  Well, our “source” wasn’t wrong.  Our entire meal was fantastic and, for a moment, I thought we were back in Europe.  The owner and employers are Turkish so this authentic, the real deal.  For all of you craving a doner fix, hit the Café Doner Box Mediterranean now and spread the word to help support this fledgling small business.  As another reviewer stated, don’t be put off by the fact that this doner stand is in a mall food court … you won’t be disappointed by this fantastic meal.  NOTE TO THE OWNER: thank you for sharing this amazing slice of Turkey to North Alabama.  And, when the funds allow, you should seriously consider starting a food truck … you will make a killing on Redstone Arsenal!!  We look forward to having another doner soon.

name: Des Turner
text: The customer service was amazing, and the food was even better.

name: Paula Dickerhoff
text: Sad, I loved this place but it appears to be closed

name: Paula Dickerhoff
text: Sad, I loved this place but it appears to be closed

name: Steve Knuble
text: Excellent Gyro.

name: From Mr. Lacy
text: Excellent!

name: Jonathan Le
text: First time coming here and got served quickly. Asked me if there’s any he can help us with. The menu is simple but had everything you need and want. I got the kahfa plate and my wife got the chicken kebab plate. Once we ordered, it didn’t take long for the food to come out. Asked if enjoyed our food. We were well taken care of. For the price and food, it was well worth it.  I will be coming back, and I do recommend this to friends!

name: Big Pop Productions
text: It was awesome. Great food. The young lady on the cash register help us with our order as this was the first time there. She did a great job.

name: Katherine Salom
text: Tried Kebab XPress for the first time today and was pleasantly surprised! You get a TON of food for your money - I know I will get two meals out of my chicken kabob plate! The hummus is fabulous. Also got a chicken shawarma and it was absolutely delicious. The restaurant is clean and the service was quick. Will definitely be coming back.

name: Quintin Wilder
text: Man man man what can I say the food and service is awesome...me and my friend was treated with so much love and he taught us the different foods it wasn't busy but he was super friendly and very very helpful...I am adding this place to a go to place.

name: Matthew Knotts
text: Hi, I wanted to comment on WD A’s review about this place, I have personally spoke with the “child” that took his order.  This guy was talking on his phone while trying to order, and acted quite disrespectful.  The person that took his order is a great person and holds himself to much higher standards than the average person. So do yourself a favor and put your phone down for 20 seconds and you’ll have a great experience at Kebab Xpress.

name: Random
text: I highly recommend their burger. One of the best double cheeseburgers I’ve ever had so far!!! Perfectly cooked and a decent size.

name: Cora
text: The chicken kebab platter was so good. I'm not a fan of hummus but even that was tasty. I happened to stumble upon this place after my dinner plans for the evening fell through somewhere else. It ended up being great service and very good food. I will definitely be back.

name: LaDonna Nguyen
text: Great food and Always fresh. Guys are always super friendly, nice, and helpful when I come. I also always go next door to the vape shop and love all of them. Love how nice and cool all the workers at both places are!

name: Last One
text: Amazing, authentic, fresh! Friendly staff, modern atmosphere. Best gyros in town! Most authentic I have found outside of the middle east.

name: Weronika Nowak
text: So when you absolutely don't know what would make you happiest when hungry, this is the place to go. I recommend the kafta, great portion and incredibly fresh and perfectly cooked vegetables. My boyfriend is happily mumbling about how he didn't even like bell pepper until now and the baby destroyed the hummus and part of my meal which I now regret sharing with my tiny broke best friend

name: Kip Hayes
text: Very friendly staff and very enjoyable food. Even the hotdog and hamburger options are tasty and filling. Service is usually quick, and the staff are very good about making sure you're ordering exactly what you want.

name: Beatriz Jimenez
text: This is the new place to be at! Great food, good prices. And the staff is very friendly!

name: Necole Oliveira
text: Their beef kabab is not what is advertised. It was just chunks of unflavored meat on rice. And when i told the guy thats not what i ordered he offered no solution other than thats how they fix it. I got my money back and will never go back

name: Teres Glover
text: I couldn’t eat it all! There’s so much food for the price. I had the chicken shwarma which had a great taste. The hummus was okay. Will definitely go back.

name: Ralph Freeman
text: If you’re looking for a proper Mediterranean experience, this ain’t it but if you’re in the mood for a decent Kabob and/or Mediterranean inspired fast food, this is your place. I probably won’t return but you could surely do worse.

name: Marley Stafford
text: Food was great and we loved how different the flavors were from similar restaurants.

name: Lee bob
text: Very tasty indeed. Typical Mediterranean food. Hummus is not runny at all.

name: David Copeland
text:
OMG!  Where do I begin?

Freshness guaranteed because nothing is made until you order it...and deciding what to order is your first hurdle.

Decision made?  Then sit back and await the masterpiece.

Falafel... AMAZING
Chicken shawarma... AMAZING
Kefta kebab... AMAZING
Hummus with a bite... AMAZING
Side salad with sumac... AMAZING
Grilled veggies... AMAZING
Rice... AMAZING

In other words...anything you are likely to order is gonna be AMAZING.

The portions are more than enough for one person too so bring an appetize.

name: Zulma Richter
text: The food is delicious and the guys working there are very nice. Excellent service!

name: Sam Zidan
text: Great store with great food

name: Darshan Raj
text: Great quality food and great service. Highly recommend Kebab Xpress!

name: John Black
text: This place is a great meditation food place. The customer service is vary good. They help you choice what you want with out  confusion

name: Chris McNealy
text: Excellent food and service!

name: مسلم وأفتخر
text: My favorite restaurant the best one here and clean and good service 👍👍👍

name: Saikar Reddy
text: Very good and custom made food.liked it and highly recommend kebab express

name: centenual gordon
text: Food was good and the service to match I definitely would recommend it to anyone... will be going back.

name: Ryan Beverly
text: Tried this place the other night after the park. For the amount of money you spend you get a lot of food and I mean a lot. Not really knowing what to order the guy behind the counter kinda helped out. I got my girl the chicken shwarma wrap which was huge and I got the Kafta Kabob which is beef and lamb mixed together. The flavor of each was unreal. Each different but good both in the same. Had the rest of the wrap for lunch. It was good still. Definitely give this place a try

name: Mohammed Shahrouj
text: The food is very good and good customer service.They asked me if  I need anything. Also, they very good beef Kabab.

name: SEIF EDDINE ASKRATNI
text: Amazing food very consistent taste and quality highly recommended!!

name: Fida Shahrouj
text: I been going there for a while they have the best kabab and shawarma you can get in Alabama also the costumer service is excellent.

name: Rebecca Jhon
text: Great customer service and the food was very good

name: Lawrencia Ratcliff
text: Great service. Love the food!!

name: Jessica Petway
text: Really good hummus. Good service.

name: jyoti shrestha
text: Chicken kabab was like stone and raw and pink from inside. I managed to ate rice but i have a bad diarrhea now!

name: Mohamed El-Sharkh
text: The food is good and is good for a quick bite.

name: Malek Shahrouj
text: I love the kebab it’s very good

name: Bama Mermaid
text: Not good! Paid $12 for a plate full of rice and 6 small peices of chicken. I do not recommend.

name: Shawn Mirzakhani
text: Great place for fast food kebab

name: Shahir Sabbah
text: Good food and good customer service

name: Sarah Najem
text: Good food And good customer service.

name: Abu Anas
text: This place is awesome place to eat

name: Sayfideen ibn Yahya
text: Delicious food! You get a lot for your money!

name: Liz O'Dell
text: Authentic, delicious food! We'll be eating there often.

name: M7 Z
text: Best Shawarma restaurant! You should try it!!!

name: Fahad Alajmi
text: so good 👌🏻

name: Saeed Latif
text: Very tasty food!

name: 7 Streams
text: A family favorite! On our way to LA from NC, stopping here was on the must-do list. KYLA offered us water while we waited for our perfected pitas. Thanks a bunch for that added touch of hospitality! We'll return soon, hopefully on our way back to NC! 💙💛💙💛💙💛#GeauxJAGS

name: Brian Dominick
text: THE STAFF MADE IT GREAT!!!! LAUREN KNOCKED IT OUT OF THE PARK!!! Great happy moods menu and product knowledge on the money. As a restauranteur I wish I had them...The food was fresh and hot and tasty.

name: Autumn Garrett
text: People inside are always very nice

name: Shane Senn
text: This place is nasty the soda fountain is nasty!!! The floor and tables so dirty!!

name: marty bains
text: Staff is always super cool!

name: Bryan Aspinwall
text: This place was excellent until this new management took over. First of all, they took the best thing (Dagwood) off the menu. Secondly, they completely changed up the way they do things. Now they just decide what toppings you get without asking for your input and when you request other toppings they get incredibly rude and say things like “oh man you really haven’t been here in a while, have you?” No I haven’t. Last time I was here, I had a pleasant experience. I will never go to this location ever again.

name: Jeremy Schill
text: I love pita pit the service is excellent and the food is extraordinary

name: jinesh n
text: Not very regular with this place. Whenever I have been here it's been nice. Nice food, quantity of food for the price is amazing. Service is good.

name: Jocelyn Gordon Walker
text: Omg!!! Forgot to take a picture of my good BUT was so excited that they had Beyond Meat!! Made this vegan happy! Will definitely be back when I return to Auburn for more games.

name: THEW00TEN10
text: I always have a good experience here. The staff is really friendly and usually quick. Chicken ceasar pita is my go to. They also stay open late which is convenient after a night in downtown Auburn. Will definitely be back!

name: Senna Simmons Barnett
text: Thai Chicken is the best!!

name: Len Montgomery
text: It's pretty much a different take on burritos. I got the Southwestern wrap. The meat was kind of sweet but it complimented the jalapenos really nicely. The pita bread was super soft and had that nice chew to it. It kind of reminded me of a Philly cheese steak but all in all it was really delicious. They also have vegetarian options like falafel and such which is a major plus. I would definitely recommend this place.

name: Gianna Anjanette
text: Wow... How have I not known about them til now?. Absolutely delicious. Better than Subway even!

name: Allen Adams
text: Open late, healthy, within easy walk of campus downtown.  Love Pita Pit!

name: Honey Folk
text: Love this place for the fresh tasty ingredients,  generous portion and the great friendly service! Its also spectacular that they have such late nights!

name: Mayra Paez
text: Great costumer service. It's healthy food for an good price, they also offer many discounts. Totally recommended.

name: Ishan Anjikar
text: I really liked the service. My server was really friendly and prepared awesome and hot  pita as i needed.

name: S K
text: A bit pricey, but good food, and they make it quick.

name: Rebecca L
text: I love Pita Pit. We usually stop in once a week. The gyro "Fork style" is my favorite. The toppings are fresh and everything is tastes great. If you order delivery, it typically takes about 45 minutes, so don't wait until you're STARVING to place your order. We've never been let down by Pita Pit. It's definitely a favorite in downtown Auburn.

name: Matt M
text: Pita Pit is outstanding. Great people with great quality chicken salads! Highly recommend! Also, they are open late which is nice as a college student!

name: Chefboy Tyree
text: The black bean pita is literally off the chains yall! If you dont eat meat this is a great option.

name: Bob Jemian
text: It was a delicious pita but WAY overstuffed and quickly became too messy to eat. They are a bit overpriced I think.

name: Caitlin Davis
text: I ordered a catered delivery for 12 people days in advance. They showed up half an hour late, and forgot some side sauces. Not an ideal situation when you're dealing with hungry athletes and staff members. Quality of the food was decent.

name: Lynda Cole
text: The staff at this establishment are amazing. The three young ladies and the guy that was there around 1am really make you feel like you are at home, and you belong at pita pit. They dont make you feel like you are a inconvience to them, and i love that because most places that are as busy as they were in Auburn make you feel like you shouldnt have walked in, in the first place.. Love love love them!!!!!! Also, the food was aboustely delicious. Tonight they had a pinini press and it made my pita 100% better. Im so glad they added this!! I had the baja chicken bacon rance its soo good. Overall i would definitely recommend this place to any and everyone....me and my friend will be back tomorrow 😂  #pitapitislife #pininipita

name: Paul EF
text: The food is always great.  However, I would suggest if you use a credit card and plan to tip, you write the exact amount you intend to pay for the whole meal.  I rounded up to the nearest $5 increment and drew a horizontal line for the change.  When the bill processed through, someone at the Pit had carried the change amount into the tip so they would get an even $5 tip, upping the total amount I paid.  A few cents is so little value, but taking money from a customer w/out permission is inexcusable.

name: Neal Fondren
text:
These people are great! They were SO attentive to my 86-yr-old mother, even when they really didn't have to be. Would go back there over and over again. The food was excellent too.

If you want hot and spicy, let them know. The can make it happen.

But the it's the classiness of the peeps there that make the difference.

name: Jas M
text: This place is amazing. The food is great it's fast and my food is never wrong. The staff is great. I highly recommend it.

name: Jason Oliver
text: Okay here's the thing I'm going to review two places because they're similar Pita Pit has an amazing tzatziki for their gyro put their pita bread leaves a bit to be desired and the meat is not off of skewer the other gyro place is Taziki's are gyros are amazing but there tzatziki sauce was really bad. This is going to sound really weird but go to Pita Pit order a gyro get extra tzatziki sauce then go to Taziki's and get a gyro off of the skewer put them together and you'll have one bomb gyro

name: victoria Mechete
text: Fast, delicious, and open until 3am

name: Neal Fondren
text:
These people are great! They were SO attentive to my 86-yr-old mother, even when they really didn't have to be. Would go back there over and over again. The food was excellent too.

If you want hot and spicy, let them know. The can make it happen.

But the it's the classiness of the peeps there that make the difference.

name: Dani M
text: The pitas are amazing! The serving size isn't very big, especially if you eat a lot, but the food quality makes it worth it

name: Sara Carwile
text: Great food, and staff is phenomenal!

name: Kayla Danmusa
text: I recently visited Pita Pit in Auburn, AL and the experience was awful. The food was non-satisfactory and I reached out to the staff in order to return the food and receive a refund and they were unconcerned about our complaints. I  also reached out to the regional manager of the establishment and he was extremely rude and apathetic to our customer experience. I feel devalued as a customer, especially after choosing to spend my hard earned money in order to benefit a business. I will not be returning to this establishment and I would not recommend it to anyone.

name: Jesica Milles
text: Was here late at night with two of my friends several weeks ago. The food was great, I ate the Pita Gyro. The staff was pleasant and most importantly fast. There is wide variety of add-ons to chose from and the salads where fresh. I liked this place, great place to eat a healthy sandwich or a pita gyro.

name: Justin Sanders
text: Love the stuffed pitas and the salads.  Pick your toppings as its made like a lot of deli style locations. Great place to eat.

name: h.w. EkoalaT
text: Like Subway with flair. Fresh, healthy, yummy options like falafel. Quick. Eat in @ their tiny booths, carryout, or order ahead for your group.

name: Wes Wilkerson
text:
TLDR: Great food but service is hit or miss.  Order online with ASAP pickup time and then show up within 10 mins.

Long Version:
Preordered with a pushed out pickup time but was unexpectedly able to arrive ~13 mins early (completely expected to have to wait for my order prep) and my order was already bagged ready to go.  Had I arrived on time my steak pita would have been cold and less desirable than normal.

Another time when I went to the place to order, the service was incredibly slow due to short staffing.  The lone employee was hustling and did a great job with my food but it took ~25 mins for me to get my order and I was first in line ahead of the rush.  Totally a staffing issue; the employee did the best they could.

My best result has been to order online with ASAP pickup time and then show up within 10 mins, despite the 15 or 20 min buffer the app gives.  That seems to be the sweet spot; everything is still hot but is ready to go and I'm in and out in no time.

name: Jagadish Torlapati
text: Only good Mediterranean food place here. The quality of service you get is ordinary. It's always one of those college kids who will not know how to fold your pita bread. I wouldn't go here unless I had a craving for Falafel.

name: danial pate
text: Excellent food and service!

name: B Wilson
text: Horrible customer service. I can't order online because it says they don't deliver to me, but they do. They've delivered my order incorrect TWICE in the last two weeks. When I called this time to complain, a RUDE employee told me I could buy another pita if I didn't like it. Do not recommend and will not order from them again. Never had this problem with Pita Pit elsewhere. Guess they don't need business.

name: Margie Warren
text: One of my favorite places

name: Motki Didi
text: Good customer service after long time.

name: Sully
text: The guy working the closing shift on 8/24/19 ~2am deserves a raise.

name: Quinton Foster
text: First time there and the freshness of the food was in every bite!

name: Macy Palmer
text:
Love this place!
Favorite spot to stop and eat when we go to Auburn!

name: Abdelkhalak El Maghribi
text: My favorite spot every Saturday night when I come to aubran,  fresh food , nice employees

name: Jarrett Moore
text: Great food. Wish parking were easier, but that's not their fault.

name: Julia Campisano
text: Ordered a $9 pita just to get home and not at all be the one I ordered. if you say my number, it should be the one I order.

name: Carl Morgan
text: Great local spot, and there open late.

name: james s
text: pretty good. cheap enough with good vegetarian options

name: Katrina Nakhjavan
text: Good food. The Alaska locations are even better, I'm sure.

name: Meme B
text: I waited almost an hour for my food, just to pull hair out of my pita! 😡 so yes i absolutely hated it.. Never will i order from them again

name: David England
text: Gryo was good I loved being able to customize it with veggies.  Staff was AUsome!  They were very patient with us being newcomers and super friendly!

name: Matt Huffman
text: Underrated food spot in downtown Auburn

name: Garrett Blackmon
text: Delicious food. If you aren't a fan of black olives have them thrown on the grill to calm them down a tad.

name: Shashank Rao
text: Good every time

name: Ken Williams
text: Good Food, Fresh and Healthy. Only wish smaller less expensive portions were available.

name: Alexandria Hicks
text: Extremely extremely rude staff tonight. I've neve had a problem before today but this will probably be my last time coming

name: Rory Young
text: Chicken souvlaki is good.

name: Claire Foster
text: The people working there are very nice and helpful

name: Amod Parkhi
text: Has a falafel pita..it was awesome..

name: Chris Hanson
text: My friend ask for the persons info above the manager and they called the police on him with false allegations of strong arming. Any contact info would help. Thanks.

name: Bo Borden
text: Always open and always good

name: Joseph Molnar
text: Diverse healthy offerings made you way

name: Justin Beck Holmes
text: Good. Healthy. Fresh.

name: Josh Gossett
text: Great late night spot, and really enjoyed the staff!

name: Alexander
text: Good spot for a quick bite! When you ask for double meat it doesn't feel like so.

name: Bojan S
text: Fresh, healthy and delicious coming from a fan of the Pita Pit who regularly eats here!

name: Jed Grant
text: I always love stopping in for some Pita Pit!

name: yunus emre özdemir
text: Long waiting

name: Tori Dillard
text: Pita Pit is God's gift to earth

name: Chulki Kim
text: Good food

name: Laroy Lockheart
text: They've stolen me from sub way friendlier service open late night and the food is cooked to order

name: ThePhotogirly
text: This place is soooo good!

name: BS
text: good!

name: Vyom Parmar
text: One of the few places open after midnight and have healthy options, however they've increased their prices recently.

name: Eng. Faisal Alqasem
text: Delicious pitas but bad staff

name: Reztierk Sukram
text: This is akin to eating "pita" version of Subway. Food is bland and the staff do not offer any interesting or creative input in your selection. Open late.

name: Brittany Brighenti
text: IF you haven't tried it, do yourself the favor!

name: Jonathan
text: Very healthy pitas. Service maybe a little slow because they usually only have 1 person making pitas.

name: Zack Taylor
text: Good food

name: Noetic Concordance
text: I love this food! My favorite thing to get is the modern Mediterranean snack box. The snack boxes make this place. I imagine if you are student walking around looking for something convenient to eat you might stop by Publix, DON'T keep walking and go to the stadium and pick up one of these snack boxes. Unfortunately that is where my expertise ends. It is the only thing I eat from here. Although I would not doubt the rest of their food is just as delicious. I guess it is hard to find. To be honest I have never eaten in the store I always use Crimson2Go. But imagine this would be just the thing to fuel a wary traveler downtown.

name: Jann Simpson
text: Zoe's has amazing fresh healthy food that is delicious! I would eat there everyday if I could :-). Plus the employees are very nice and courteous. I give them 5 stars!

name: venson nunnaley
text: Tried to order carry out, ended up having to order from Northport location because no one would answer the phone after 4 attempts during regular business hours.  Very frustrating when I have my mind set on a convenient meal from a good chain.  Must have very poor staff.

name: David Goist
text: Good food at good price.  Unique location.

name: Bethany Cox
text: Delicious fresh food.  Stopped by on the way through on a road trip.  It was a refreshing change of pace to the fried, greasy food at other restaurants.

name: Easir Papon
text: Excellent food....kabob is a must try

name: Lee Ann Wagner
text: Love the food and great service
